title: Head, Investment and Research Management Job at Maurice Xandra Solutions Limited
content:
Maurice Xandra Solutions Limited is a management consulting company that renders quality services in Human Resource, Management and Process improvement. MXS Limited was set up to provide high quality, up to date training, team management and process improvement services for its clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head, Investment and Research Management

Job Location: Lagos

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	To provide leadership to the Company’s investment, research & portfolio management function, which encompasses investment research, portfolio strategy, construction and management.
	To identify and evaluate investment opportunities across different asset classes, develop suitable investment strategies in accordance with investment objectives and manage investment portfolios for mutual funds, high net worth and institutional clients.


Key Responsibilities


	Lead the process of undertaking independent research of investment opportunities across multiple asset classes and analysis covering both global and local macroeconomic trends.
	Prepare and oversee the production of research reports/presentations, reflecting outcome of independent research/analysis.
	Develop financial models and projections to support investment decision-making.
	Prepare investment policy statements for all investment portfolios managed by the Company.
	Work with business development executives to prepare investment management proposals for current and prospective clients.
	Collaborate with investment officers, operations officers, compliance and other relevant internal parties to coordinate trading and management of portfolios.
	Actively contribute to the development and implementation of strategies geared towards the attainment of stated investment objectives of portfolios.
	Implement agreed and approved portfolio strategy for investment portfolios.
	Regularly monitor and review the investment portfolios against the investment objectives and mandates.
	Regularly meet with clients to discuss clients’ portfolios including portfolio strategy and outlook.


Qualifications, Experience and Attributes


	Undergraduate Degree in Accounting, Finance, Economics or related field with a strong academic record.
	A minimum of Eight (8) years of work experience in a similar role, with at least 4 years in a lead position
	Professional certification(s) in Finance and/or Accounting from recognized professional bodies (e.g. CFA, ACA, ACCA,)
	Deep knowledge of and interest in the Financial Markets, as well as strong business and financial acumen.
	Strong quantitative and qualitative analysis skills.
	Proven leadership, negotiating and influencing skills.
	Strong oral and written communication skills.
	Excellent networking skills, particularly relationship-building and interpersonal skills.
	Strong results orientation and high attention to details.
	Accountability and a demonstrable sense of personal responsibility and ownership mentality.
	High ethical standards and level of integrity.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@mauricexandra.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Branch Manager Job at Westfield Consulting Limited
content:
Westfield Consulting Limited - Our client in the Banking sector (One of the new generation banks) is looking for qualified and passionate candidates for the position below:

Job Position: Branch Manager

Job Locations: Abuja (FCT) and Warri, Delta
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports To: Head, Retail & SME Banking
Grade: AM - DM 

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Responsible for the effective management of the Bank branch, formulate and implement sales and marketing plans, ensure efficient operations, staff management, compliance with bank policies and procedures, other financial and administrative functions, and the profitability of the branch


Principal Duties and Responsibilities


	Formulate and implement localized sales and marketing plans in line with the Bank’s policy.
	Plan and implement sales and marketing activities within the branch to grow the liabilities business and achieve sales targets.
	Allocate branch resources effectively, including manpower, operational costs, promotion budgets etc.
	Formulate directives of identifying business opportunities.
	Develop and implement business and customer service strategies.
	Develop quality loan portfolio to obtain the bank’s loan growth objectives.
	Accept, analyse, collect and review required documents to initiate the loan process.
	Monitor loan portfolio to correct loan document exceptions.
	Manage operational risk, - identify, assess, mitigate, and control, ensure application of control measures to minimize risk exposure of the Bank.
	Ensure deposit growth to obtain the bank’s deposit growth objectives by promoting the Bank’s services.
	Communicate and implement new ideas and marketing strategies within branch market area to improve sales, cross-sell, marketing, and staff development.
	Provide directives and guidance on all operational and personnel matters to employees in the branch.
	Achieve overall branch sales performance objectives and targets on individual products by monitoring subordinates.
	Monitor and review sales performance goals of individual sales and marketing staff, monitor, update, review and implement branch sales plan.
	Provide sales coaching and training to marketing staff of the branch to enhance their performance.
	Maintain a high level of employee morale to minimize turnover and maximize customer service satisfaction.
	Implement corporate culture through reinforcement of quality service and teamwork and maintain a high level of employee morale within the branch.
	Maintain efficient workdays, lead the personnel in the branch, ensure customer service relations to meet the branch's financial goals.
	Ensure branch compliance with audit and regulatory procedures.
	Oversee the day-to-day duties of personnel, facilitate communication between departments and provide regular reports to top Management.
	Manage the branch to achieve assigned performance targets.


Qualifications and Experience


	Degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or related discipline in a recognised university. A postgraduate qualification or relevant professional certification would be an added advantage.
	A minimum 7 years of continuous banking experience in sales and credit with at least 4 years in a supervisory role.
	Good knowledge of Basic Accounting and Financial Analysis, Business Law, Business/Financial Advisory services, Banking Operations, Leasing, Trade Services, Laws, and regulations relating to Banking.
	Familiar with the bank’s core accounting system.
	Knowledge of personal computer and related word processing and spreadsheet software.
	Credit Risk Assessment and Analysis skills, relationship management and networking skills, excellent business writing and presentation skills.


Remuneration


	Very Attractive.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their recent CV to: victor.allu@westfield-consulting.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: The role is strictly for qualified candidates currently in the Banking Industry.

title: Restaurant Liaison Officer Job at FoodOnline Limited
content:
FoodOnline is a dynamic food delivery and logistics tech company revolutionizing how Nigerians access meals. It connects users to their favorite restaurants and food vendors through a fast, user-friendly mobile app.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Restaurant Liaison Officer
Job Locations: Jabi, Utako, Wuye, Wuse, Mabushi - Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Join FoodOnline and help us deliver food faster and smarter!
	We’re looking for smart, young, and organized individuals who can work with restaurants to ensure fast and correct orders.


Your Role


	Receive order screenshot.
	Buy and confirm food from restaurant.
	Label, seal, and hand over to the assigned rider.
	Communicate delays or issues to the team.


Requirements


	Minimum of an SSCE (WAEC, NECO, or equivalent).
	Must be at least 16 years old.
	Must live in or near Jabi, Utako, Wuye, Wuse, or Mabushi.
	Polite, smart, and presentable.
	Own a smartphone with WhatsApp.
	Knows how to move fast and communicate clearly.


Salary & Benefits


	Salary: N70,000 / Month.
	Bonus tied to performance.
	Growth opportunity in a fast-moving company.
	On-the-job training.

title: Content Marketer Job at Health Connect 24x7
content:
Health Connect 24x7 combines next-generation telemedicine, telemonitoring and home health to provide you with immediate access to highly trained and experienced doctors and wellness experts for healthy, acute and chronic condition management and advice via voice/ video calls, as well as on-site doctors and clinics. You can talk to our full-time doctors and wellness experts from anywhere in the world, whether you are at home, at the office, on a business trip or on vacation. Health Connect 24x7 provides consumers with a true 24x7 population health management. Our goal is to ensure appropriate balance between quality and cost, starting from the moment you access our physician helpline to the point of recovery.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Marketer

Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work mode: hybrid (2days on-site)

Job Description


	The Content Marketer will undertake content marketing initiatives in alignment with the marketing strategy to achieve business targets.


Responsibilities


	Researching HC-related topics (combining online sources)
	Develop editorial calendar, delegate tasks and ensure deadlines are met
	Write clear marketing copy to promote HC brand/services
	Deliver engaging content on a regular basis and inspire team members
	Optimize content considering SEO and Google Analytics
	Identify customers’ needs and gaps in our content and recommend new topics
	Coordinate with marketing and design teams to illustrate articles
	Update website content as needed
	Ensure all-around consistency (style, fonts, images and tone)
	Proofread the articles before publication
	Generate ideas for new content composition, write engaging content and ensure that it adheres to SEO standards.
	Compose product description to promote HC brand and services
	Work together with different department to create innovative content ideas
	Create content piece that appeal to our audience, attract customer and boost our brand awareness.


Requirements


	Education: BSc / HND
	Relevant trainings/ certification in content marketing Other requirements:
	At least 6 month cognate experience.
	Proficient in the use of Microsoft office suite Energetic
	Detail oriented


Salary
N150,000 / month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobs@healthconnect247.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
